summary: Swapped out the bard song Ragnor the red for a cover of the calling\'s Wherever you will go by charlene Soraia check it out :P
descriptionHtml:
fist of all let me say that i have never done anthing like this before but when i downloaded the mod for dragonborn bard song i had to change the others they do get taxing over time so this is my first and i am probably gonna try change the last aswell not sure on song choice though

used original fuz files opened them up took out the wav and added a full song split into 6 parts original lip movement added back into game as I am not clued up on the lip files and I did read up about it but wow it looks complicated and allot more work and time than I have at the minute I decided to leave it  the song is viewable on you tube here 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-cS-P-9DPA
There is a read-me on were to put the file once you have them
hope you like it
peace out 
wizzy..
author: Wizzy
